title: Luna Smiles
description:
Luna is a bold and vibrant brand that’s perfect for a cosmetic dental practice looking to make a statement. This look uses a combination of chunky serif fonts, hand-drawn visual ornaments and diverse imagery to create a youthful and inclusive atmosphere.

Imagine walking into a dental practice that feels energetic and trendy. That’s the Luna vibe. It’s perfect for attracting patients who want a smile that’s as confident and unique as they are.

Get the Luna look as-is or with customizations to its colors, fonts and photo styles to refresh your current visual identity without changing your name. Or get a completely fresh start with the full Luna visual identity, name and domain lunasmiles.com
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with an approachable and vibrant look.

title: Illume
description:
Illume is a brand designed for the modern and sophisticated dental practice, regardless of specialty. This look utilizes a minimal and understated color palette of greens and grays, paired with striking black and white photography, creating an upscale and polished aesthetic.

Imagine a dental experience that feels refined, contemporary, and focused on delivering exceptional results. Embrace the Illume look as-is or with customizations to its color palette and photographic style to refresh your current visual identity. Or, for a complete transformation, adopt the full Illume identity, name, and domain (illumesmiles.com) to cultivate a brand that exudes confidence and sophistication.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with a professional and upscale look.

title: Enamel
description:
Enamel is a minimal and neutral look that’s perfect for a sophisticated cosmetic or general dental business. The look sets a modern tone, leaning on a pared-down color palette of neutrals with ample white space and bold contrasting dark colors. Modern geometric fonts and a studio portrait photography style are sure to give your patients the impression that you’ll make them feel like a star.

Enamel’s colors, fonts and photo style can be used as-is or customized to refresh your practice’s look without changing your name. It can also be used as a complete brand identity for rebrands along with its name, which plays off of dental anatomy, and the domain enameldentistry.co
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with a minimal and modern look.

title: Seaport Smiles
description:
Seaport Smiles captures the essence of coastal comfort and modern sophistication. This look utilizes a palette of calming blues and versatile neutrals, alongside serif fonts and a minimal nautical-inspired logomark. The result is a visual identity that feels established, trustworthy, and in perfect harmony with its surroundings, a modern twist on timeless style.

Use the Seaport Smiles look as-is or with customizations to its fonts, color palette and photo style to create a brand that reflects your unique practice. Or, for a complete transformation, go all in and adopt the full Seaport Smiles identity, name and domain (seaportdentist.com) to cultivate a brand that inspires confidence and lasting smiles.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with an upscale and traditional look.

title: Arches
description:
Arches is a fresh, clean look that’s geared towards orthodontics practices but could work equally well for general or cosmetic practices. This look leans on modern, geometric fonts and a pared-down color palette of blues and whites to project a modern take on colors traditionally used by many dental practices. 

Use the Arches look as-is or with customizations to its colors, fonts and photo styles to refresh your current visual identity without changing your name. Or get an entirely fresh start by using the full Arches visual identity, name and domain archesortho.com or archesdentistry.com.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with an approachable and modern look.

title: Pureglow
description:
Pureglow is a look that exudes a sense of natural beauty and sophistication that’s perfect for an upscale practice. This look utilizes a calming, neutral color palette inspired by skin tones, alongside sophisticated serif display fonts and imagery that showcases an aesthetic of relaxed and comfortable health and beauty. 

The Pureglow look can be seamlessly integrated into your existing brand by incorporating its colors, fonts, and visual style for a refreshing update. Alternatively, you can opt for a complete rebrand by adopting the full Pureglow identity, including the name and domain (pureglowdental.com or pureglowortho.com), creating a cohesive and impactful brand presence.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with a neutral and professional look.

title: Grincraft
description:
Grincraft is a look that's bursting with modern personality. This look utilizes a bold, monochrome green color palette of greens with a pop of neon for an attention-grabbing twist. Sans-serif fonts and a portrait style set against branded backgrounds create a clean and energetic aesthetic. 

Incorporate the Grincraft look into your existing brand as-is or with customizations to its color to create a brand that reflects your unique style. Or, for a complete transformation, go all in and adopt the full Grincraft identity, name and domain (grincraft.com) for a one-word brand that’s easy for patients to remember, type into their web browser and tell their friends about.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with a vibrant and upscale look.

title: Radiance
description:
Radiance is a brand that exudes warmth, positivity, and vibrancy. This look utilizes a color palette that combines warm and bright yellows and oranges with calming dark greens, creating a sense of excitement and optimism. Modern chunky serif fonts and a unique use of brand-colored backgrounds in stock photography tie the visual identity together for a cohesive and energetic aesthetic. 

Imagine a dental experience that feels bright, welcoming, and focused on enhancing your natural smile– that’s Radiance. Radiance is perfect for a cosmetic or general dental practice seeking to portray an exciting, friendly and approachable atmosphere. 

Use the Radiance look as-is or with customizations to its colors, fonts and photo styles to refresh your current visual identity without changing your name. Or, for a complete transformation, adopt the full Radiance identity, name and domain (radiancecosmetic.com or radiancedentist.com) for a brand that shines.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with a playful and approachable look.

title: Brilliance
description:
Brilliance is a look that utilizes a color palette of earth tones and a photography style that’s bathed in warm, natural light to strike a grounded, organic appearance fit for a practice focused on enhancing natural beauty.
Incorporate the Brilliance look as-is or with customizations to its colors, fonts and photo styles to refresh your current visual identity without changing your name. Or, embrace a complete transformation by adopting the full Brilliance identity, name and domain (brilliancedentist.com) to cultivate a brand that connects with patients seeking a beautiful, healthy smile.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with a modern and playful look.

title: Lumena
description:
Lumena is a modern and upscale look that would work well for a cosmetic, general or orthodontic business. This look relies on chunky serif-style typography and a color palette of greens and pastels to project a calming, sophisticated and current vibe.

The Lumena look can be used to refresh your brand or as a full identity for rebrands, complete with the domain name lumenadental.com. The name, which is available for use when paired with an active Patientli subscription, is evocative of the ideal outcome of great dentistry, a beautiful, luminous smile.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with minimal and playful look.

title: Aura
description:
Aura is a modern and upscale look that’s designed with an urban cosmetic dental practice in mind. The look combines a palette of warm colors that lean in a slightly feminine direction with studio-style portrait photography and clean fonts to establish an identity that feels at home in the health and beauty space. 

Carry Aura’s look into your own brand by using its colors, fonts and visual style for a brand refresh or use the full Aura identity in a full rebrand, complete with the name and domain auracosmeticdental.com, available with an active Patientli plan.
shortDescription: Perfect for the dental brand with a traditional and approachable look.

title: SoHo Orthodontics
description:
SoHo Orthodontics is a brand grounded in confidence and quiet sophistication. This look features a refined earth-toned palette of olive, stone, and cream that evokes a natural, trustworthy feel while remaining stylish and modern. Elegant serif fonts elevate the brand, while the clean sans-serif body text ensures clarity and warmth. Portraits and materials lean into authenticity, diversity, and calm professionalism—highlighting real people with real smiles.

Subtle, polished, and quietly confident, the SoHo look is perfect for practices that want to convey expertise without flash. Embrace this identity as-is, or personalize the palette and imagery to make SoHo distinctly yours.
shortDescription: Perfect for the orthodontic brand with a minimal and neutral look.

title: Balance Chiropractic
description:
The Balance Chiropractic brand look is rooted in calm confidence and natural alignment. With a grounded palette of forest green, clay, cream, and sandstone, this identity evokes stability, health, and holistic strength. Elegant serif type paired with minimal layouts reinforces the feeling of trust and professionalism—while lifestyle imagery emphasizes movement, wellness, and vitality.

This look is ideal for modern chiropractic clinics that want to connect with patients seeking not only pain relief, but long-term wellness. Whether displayed on business cards, signage, or social content, Balance Chiropractic communicates strength in stillness and the power of alignment.

Embrace this brand for a chiropractic practice that feels warm, expert-led, and rooted in restoring natural harmony.
shortDescription: Perfect for the chiropractic brand with an approachable and neutral look.

title: Align Chiropractics
description:
Align Chiropractic is a refined, minimal brand look that centers on clarity, purpose, and holistic movement. With soft sage, gentle cream, and grounding charcoal tones, this palette promotes a sense of calm and contemporary wellness. The typographic pairing of elegant serif headlines and understated paragraph text reflects both professionalism and approachability.

Photography captures the ease of movement, deep breathing, and the joy of an aligned lifestyle—ideal for a modern chiropractic practice that champions long-term wellness, not just symptom relief.

From tote bags to ID badges, Align Chiropractic delivers a cohesive, elevated aesthetic that speaks to patients who seek thoughtful care and a fresh, modern experience. This look is perfect for clinics that value both design and function—where feeling better starts with alignment in every sense.
shortDescription: Perfect for the chiropractic brand with a minimal and approachable look.
